narrative.narrative: Tassili Airlines is an Algerian airline based at Algiers and were founded in 1997. As of June 2013 they operate at 13 domestic airports and fly to Rome and Saint-Etienne,France. They also charter for the Algerian oil industry, and in fact are owned 51% by the state owned oil and gas company Sonatrach. The other 49% of the airline is owned by Air Algerie. They have 12 planes as of June 2013, four 737-800's, four Dash 8 Q400's, and four Dash 8 Q200's. They have three Embraer 190's on order.
